meanings.definition: Capable of being shown or displayed.
meanings.sent1: The new painting is very showable.
meanings.sent2: The showable jewelry sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent3: The showable cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her talent was showable like a bright star in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The showable fireworks lit up the night sky with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Able to be presented or exhibited.
meanings.sent1: The showable poster caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The showable skills of the performers amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The showable outfit made her the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: His showable enthusiasm was contagious to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The showable art installation was the highlight of the event.

meanings.definition: Suitable for being demonstrated or revealed.
meanings.sent1: The experiment had a showable outcome.
meanings.sent2: The showable evidence proved his innocence.
meanings.sent3: The showable secret was finally unveiled.
meanings.sent4: Her showable emotions were evident in her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The showable truth could no longer be hidden.
